short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to calculate & display the total duration of a youtube playlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A handy chrome extension to get total youtube playlist duration.

This works in two simple steps : 
1. Go to the youtube playlist page for which you want to see the total duration.
2. That's all
